NOMBRE: Paid Search Leader - Para Importante Agencia de Marketing Digital
DESCRIPCION: We are looking for a Bilingual Paid Search Leader, for our USA clients, with experience in Google Ads and Facebook Ads platforms.The Paid Search Lead manages the development of Paid Search campaigns and strategies to help achieve client goals. You'll partner with colleagues across channels to ensure that campaigns are creative; test new solutions and evaluate and improve campaigns to improve our client's business goals. This important, client-facing role is a balance of strategy and execution, and will lead by example within the team and helps to manage projects or daily activities.You Will:•	Plan and manage Paid Search (PPC/SEM) campaigns, including account setup, strategy development, organization, and management•	Oversee ongoing optimization efforts to meet campaign goals, including daily management of campaign budgets, on-site conversion actions, bid management, negative keyword strategies, website and category exclusions, ad creative, and landing page revisions based on performance history and our client's goals•	Use reporting, analytics, and trend tools, including Google Analytics, comScore, and Compete•	Audit both assigned client accounts and assist other accounts when needed•	Analyze paid search beta tests and new platforms/vendors•	Assist Client Services team with client communications around paid search knowledge, and recommendations to deliver a clear strategic vision to our client•	Forecast and plan paid search growth, and communicate opportunity with the client•	Be an advanced technical/discipline leader, and manage client communication without requiring Account Supervisor involvement•	Draw important analysis from data and make specific recommendations – i.e. adapted to change strategies and recommendations based on data sets•	Contribute to our thought leadership on PPC industry topics•	Make credible strategic recommendations, provide updates against goals and participate in QBRsYou Have:•	3+ years of experience managing large-scale, complex paid search campaigns.•	Well versed in success measurements, specifically in Branding/Awareness and Direct Response.•	In-depth understanding of Paid Search campaign management and optimization practices, and search retargeting.•	Experience with Paid Search Platforms like Marin, Kenshoo, DS3.•	GDN experience a plus.•	Google Certification (Fundamentals), Analytics and Adwords Certification.•	Understanding of Display Media, SEO, Affiliates, Feeds, Mobile, Social and Attribution and influence on Paid Search Activities.•	Desire to see things through to completion and deliver results.•	Experience mentoring and fostering the development of new talent.•	Bachelor’s degree.

NOMBRE: Paid Social Leader - Para importante Agencia de Marketing Digital
DESCRIPCION: The Paid Social Leader is responsible for the implementation and execution of Paid Social campaigns in line with the agreed activation strategy.  This role maintains, develops and exceeds client performance targets.Key Accountabilities:•	Ensures Paid Social campaigns are managed effectively to achieve expected performance targets •	Monitor and optimizes Paid Social campaign implementations•	Manage daily spend in line with targets and monthly budgets •	Liaison with experts from other teams including organic search, paid search and display •	Create and execute media plans that surpass client goals•	Develop a close working relationship with partners and technology suppliers •	Provide accurate client communication that details performance and return on investment via regular campaign reporting and analysis •	Liaise with other channels•	Mentor junior staff, helps to manage their projects and day-to-day activities ensuring all team tasks are executed on time and meet/exceed client expectations and campaign requirements•	Builds strong relationships across client services team and with client.  •	Assists with meetings, QBRs as needed•	Create internal and external written POVs and case studies to communicate complex subject matter in a digestible way•	Help ensure operational excellence is delivered across their assigned team/pod Qualifications: •	Detailed knowledge of Paid Social marketing techniques and platform buying tools•	Understanding of performance metrics and ability to spot trends or discrepancies.•	Fluency with Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint •	Ability to manipulate analyze and interpret large quantities of data•	Strong QA abilities with an eye for detail •	Strong organizational skills, project management ability and task delegation ability •	Excellent communication and presentation skills both verbal and written •	High levels of integrity, autonomy, and self-motivation•	A strong numerical and analytical background•	Media planning and presentation

BairesDev es la empresa líder de desarrollo de software de América. Con más de 1000 empleados trabajando en proyectos alrededor del mundo, un crecimiento anual sostenido de más del 50%, y reconocida por Inc. en el Top 10 de empresas privadas de mayor crecimiento de Silicon Valley, BairesDev se ha posicionado como referente en la industria del software, impulsando la transformación digital de algunas de las empresas más importantes en el mundo, como Google, Rolls-Royce, Pinterest, EY, SiriusXM, Motorola & ViacomCBS.Reconocida por Clutch co como una Compañía Top de Servicios Tecnológicos B2B, BairesDev cuenta con oficinas en Estados Unidos, Canadá, Europa y América Latina y ofrece un entorno de trabajo excepcional donde sus empleados pueden destacarse como profesionales, desarrollándose en equipos multiculturales con horarios flexibles y múltiples oportunidades de crecimiento.  BairesDev tiene como misión ofrecer servicios personalizados de desarrollo de software reconocidos por su excelencia a nivel mundial. La empresa contrata únicamente al Top 1% del Talento del mercado con el objetivo de crear equipos sólidos que ofrezcan soluciones tecnológicas de principio a fin. Prepárate para trabajar en escenarios dinámicos con líderes en la industria y en proyectos altamente innovadores!Buscamos Desarrolladores Salesforce Marketing Cloud para sumarse al equipo de Desarrollo y participar en distintos proyectos conformados por equipos multiculturales distribuidos en todo el mundo. Buscamos personas proactivas, dinámicas y team players, con gran capacidad de organización, acostumbradas a manejar múltiples tareas y con marcada atención al detalle. Se trata de una excelente oportunidad para aquellos profesionales que busquen desarrollarse en una de las empresas con mayor crecimiento de la industria! Estos desarrolladores enfrentarán numerosos desafíos técnicos, por lo cual deberán utilizar tecnologías actuales, involucrarse en el mundo mobile, de aplicaciones web, dispositivos, etc.Principales responsabilidades:- Configurar y estructurar modelos de datos (extensiones de datos, extensiones de datos compartidos, modelo de contacto).- Crear activos de marketing dinámicos y personalizados utilizando varios lenguajes de secuencias de comandos.- Desarrollar la experiencia web de Marketing Cloud (formularios de datos, páginas de preferencias personalizadas).- Trabajar y resolver escenarios utilizando REST y SOAP API.- Trabajar con clientes y datos de la plataforma (SQL, vistas, Enviar registro).- Escribir SQL básico, incluidas las declaraciones de unión.- Configurar la importación de datos.- Explicar la gestión de suscripciones.¿Qué Buscamos?- Más de 5 años de experiencia integrando Salesforce Marketing Cloud con Sales Cloud.- Experiencia en configuración de datos, manipulación y segmentación avanzada, así como informes y análisis.- Contar con experiencia práctica como desarrollador de pila completa para Marketing Cloud creando mensajes personalizados, dinámicos, páginas de destino y lenguajes de script de Marketing Cloud.- Dominar Marketing Cloud Connector, extensiones de datos, integración con sistemas externos (API) y conocimiento de DMP e integración de datos es clave.- Certificado en Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer. (Deseable pero no excluyente)¿Qué Ofrecemos?- Excelente plan de compensación, muy por encima de la media del mercado.- Posibilidad de trabajo remoto y con horarios flexibles.- Planes de capacitación.- Amplias posibilidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional gracias a nuestro sistema de mentorship.Si está interesado en formar parte de un equipo compuesto por los mejores profesionales y trabajar 100% orientado a objetivos en un entorno innovador, pero con la estructura y los recursos de un líder de mercado multinacional, ¡no dude en postularse!

El profesional será responsable de aportar estrategias de marketing efectivas, para optimizar el posicionamiento de la Consultora.Tendrá las siguientes funciones:• Crear contenidos digitales, en diversos formatos: artículos, vídeos, fotos, ebooks, guías, webinars, etc. Este contenido será usado posteriormente en diversas estrategias: publicitarias, posicionamiento (SEO) de la web, imagen de marca, promoción y apoyo a eventos, etc.• Diseñar acciones dirigidas a aumentar la visibilidad de la marca en medios online y offline, y en la mejora de su imagen frente a los usuarios (Branding).• Gestionar los perfiles de la compañía en las redes sociales y su uso en las estrategias de contenidos (Social Media).• Realizar seguimiento de las principales acciones y estrategias de la competencia en el ámbito del marketing digital.• Identificar potenciales clientesNos orientamos a un profesional:o Con conocimientos avanzados en las herramientas digitales más novedosas para la gestión de contenidos en webs, blogs y redes sociales, análisis web, optimización SEO, búsqueda de palabras clave, etc.o Con perfil creativo y activo en la generación de propuestas; con capacidad de análisis y autogestión.o Capaz de llevar a la práctica con eficacia y en los plazos previstos las distintas acciones e interrelacionarlas, para lograr los objetivos de marketing de la compañía.o Que sepa trabajar con flexibilidad y espíritu crítico para poder detectar posibles errores o áreas de mejora en las estrategias definidas, y proponer y poner en marcha las correcciones necesarias.

BairesDev es la empresa líder de desarrollo de software de América. Buscamos personas proactivas, dinámicas y team players, con gran capacidad de organización, acostumbradas a manejar múltiples tareas y con marcada atención al detalle. Se trata de una excelente oportunidad para aquellos profesionales que busquen desarrollarse en una de las empresas con mayor crecimiento de la industria! Estos desarrolladores enfrentarán numerosos desafíos técnicos, por lo cual deberán utilizar tecnologías actuales, involucrarse en el mundo mobile, de aplicaciones web, dispositivos, etc.Principales responsabilidades:- Configurar y estructurar modelos de datos (extensiones de datos, extensiones de datos compartidos, modelo de contacto).- Crear activos de marketing dinámicos y personalizados utilizando varios lenguajes de secuencias de comandos.- Desarrollar la experiencia web de Marketing Cloud (formularios de datos, páginas de preferencias personalizadas).- Trabajar y resolver escenarios utilizando REST y SOAP API.- Trabajar con clientes y datos de la plataforma (SQL, vistas, Enviar registro).- Escribir SQL básico, incluidas las declaraciones de unión.- Configurar la importación de datos.- Explicar la gestión de suscripciones.¿Qué Buscamos?- Más de 5 años de experiencia integrando Salesforce Marketing Cloud con Sales Cloud.- Experiencia en configuración de datos, manipulación y segmentación avanzada, así como informes y análisis.- Contar con experiencia práctica como desarrollador de pila completa para Marketing Cloud creando mensajes personalizados, dinámicos, páginas de destino y lenguajes de script de Marketing Cloud.- Dominar Marketing Cloud Connector, extensiones de datos, integración con sistemas externos (API) y conocimiento de DMP e integración de datos es clave.- Certificado en Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer. (Deseable pero no excluyente)¿Qué Ofrecemos?- Excelente plan de compensación, muy por encima de la media del mercado.- Posibilidad de trabajo remoto y con horarios flexibles.- Planes de capacitación.- Amplias posibilidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional gracias a nuestro sistema de mentorship.Si está interesado en formar parte de un equipo compuesto por los mejores profesionales y trabajar 100% orientado a objetivos en un entorno innovador, pero con la estructura y los recursos de un líder de mercado multinacional, ¡no dude en postularse!

No discriminamos en función del género, religión, etnia, nacionalidad, cultura, grupo social, discapacidad o enfermedad, orientación sexual, estado civil, edad u opinión política. Cuando elegimos el personal para un cliente, la decisión se basa única y exclusivamente en los méritos y capacidades de esa persona.Adecco no solicita dinero a cambio de sus servicios. Participar de una búsqueda con nosotros es parte de nuestro compromiso y tarea. Por ello, postularte y participar en una oferta de empleo, es GRATIS.

NOMBRE: Asistente de Marketing Digital y Generación de Demanda
DESCRIPCION: Misión del Puesto:El objetivo del puesto es generar demanda para la plataforma cumpliendo con objetivos de venta, buscando la excelencia en CX dentro de los costos asignados. Las tareas más relevantes a desempeñar son:•	Ejecución y seguimiento del Plan de Marketing;•	Garantizar el cumplimiento de los objetivos del plan de marketing.•	Análisis de indicadores y datos estadísticos de mercado. •	Diseñar la estrategia de Marketing en canales digitales/redes sociales. Promoción y comunicación. •	Coordinación con los proveedores de actividades promocionales;•	Desarrollar tareas vinculadas al posicionamiento de la plataforma en medios digitales y redes sociales: Google ads, Facebook ads, Instagram. •	Segmentación de la base de clientes. Armado de Perfiles de consumidores. •	Ejecutar campañas de e-mail marketing por segmento. •	Gestionar la relación con proveedores de servicios externos. •	Identificar oportunidades de negocio no exploradas con base en las tendencias más destacables del mercado y los hábitos de consumo de los clientes.Para la búsqueda:1.	Nos orientamos a un profesional de entre 25 y 30 años de edad, preferentemente con conocimiento o formación de Marketing, Comercialización o afines. 2.	Muy buen manejo del paquete Office.3.	Será imprescindible contar con un perfil dinámico, proactivo, con marcadas habilidades de negociación y liderazgo de equipos de trabajo. 4.	Deberá contar con una experiencia no menos a 2 años en puestos similares.5.	Conocimientos de e mail marketing y manejo de aplicaciones de envío de mails tipo Mailchimp, Getresponse, SendInBlue u otro. 6.	Conocimientos de publicidad en Facebook, Instagram y Google. 7.	Contar con conocimientos de estructura creativa, segmentación de targets, analytics y SEO.8.	Experiencia Digital / Web: Web Design, Social Media y Publicidad On-Line.9.	Conocimientos en Google Analytics, WebTrends y Google Adwords.Durante la primer etapa de trabajo se desempeñará en forma de remote office, pudiéndose mas adelante realizar reuniones en forma semanal que requieren el traslado a CABA. Al cargar el CV no olvidar completar el requerimiento salarial.

Las responsabilidades específicas incluyen:- Crear y administrar la línea de tiempo general del proyecto para los objetivos de M + C- Programar reuniones clave y capture notas y próximos pasos- Mantener la recopilación de los requisitos de las partes interesadas y los casos de uso así como el seguimiento de los entregables- Asistir en la gestión financiera.- Mantener listas de distribución de usuarios finales / partes interesadas- Administración de la ubicación del sitio (equipos de Microsoft colecciones) y organización de materiales de referencia (guías rápidas videos puntos clave de contacto preguntas frecuentes etc.)- Programación de sesiones de capacitación y reuniones de preparación para la gestión del cambio orquestación de presentadores invitados y desarrollo de plantilla de material- Asistir al propietario del producto en la administración de encuestas e informes contra KPIRequisitos: - Mínimo de 5 años de experiencia en gestión de proyectos con soluciones técnicas.- Experiencia previa en la ejecución de actividades relacionadas con la Gestión del Cambio- Licenciatura o equivalente- Idealmente experiencia previa en marketing- Nivel de Idioma: inglés avanzado  Experis es el líder global en soluciones de selección y gestión de proyectos para perfiles profesionales. Impulsamos el crecimiento de las organizaciones a través de la atracción evaluación y selección de talento especializado.Más que nunca el crecimiento de las empresas pasa por disponer de los profesionales más adecuados - el talento especializado que diferencia a su organización de la competencia-. Por este motivo compañías de todo el mundo cuentan con Experis una compañía diferente en la nueva era del talento y de las personas.Nuestro profundo conocimiento sectorial nos permite entender los desafíos a los que se enfrenta su negocio y tener acceso a profesionales altamente calificados que le ayuden a aprovechar las oportunidades. Experis conecta su compañía al talento especializado que necesita para que juntos puedan alcanzar nuevos retos. En Experis promovemos una cultura inclusiva y diversa basada en el respeto y en la igualdad de oportunidades. Valorando los diferentes aportes de las personas sin importar su condición raza religión etnia nacionalidad genero orientación sexual edad y discapacidad.

Capital Humano se encuentra en la búsqueda de un CRM & Marketing Automation Specialist para incorporarse a entidad financiera ubicada en CABA. Nos orientamos a graduados o estudiantes avanzados de Marketing o carreras afines con experiencia de al menos 2 años administrando plataformas de CRM y/o Marketing Automation ejecutando múltiples canales (Email SMS Facebook etc.) y analizando los resultados post-campaña. Entre sus tareas se encuentran:-        Diseñar e implementar el programa de CRM & Marketing Automation ejecutando acciones concretas de 1:1 marketing y marketing automation (Activación Cross Selling Up Selling y Fidelización entre otras) por medio de canales como email SMS push notifications Whatsapp y Facebook Custom Audiences.-        Trabajar en equipo junto a referentes de Social Media Email Marketing Performance Diseño y Comunicación como así también con las áreas de BI IT Legales CX Producto y con múltiples proveedores externos.-        Desarrollar planes para la generación de leads e implementar un calendario de acciones y flujos de automation para los usuarios/clientes ya registrados en función de acompañar los objetivos de apertura de cuentas y alentar el uso de nuestros productos financieros conforme al ciclo de vida del cliente (Adquisición Conversión Madurez y Declive).-        Liderar proyectos de gestión de datos e integraciones con la plataforma de CRM con el fin de acelerar la generación de contenidos dinámicos e incrementar los criterios de segmentación que permitan maximizar los resultados de las campañas de 1:1 marketing y marketing automation.-        Seguir los indicadores o KPIs a diario con el objetivo de cumplir con la cuota de aperturas de cuenta tasa de fondeo y operación de los productos. Es requisito contar con manejo de Excel Avanzado conocimientos en Google Analytics y herramientas de Email Marketing. Se valorará un nivel intermedio/avanzado de inglés y conocimientos de HTML Adobe Photoshop y Adobe Dreamweaver.Lugar de trabajo: CABA Horario: Lunes a viernes de 9 a 18hs.

Carne Collective is searching for a Full Senior Digital Marketing specialist focus on CRM  Marketing Automation & Performance & Social Media managementWe are an Argentine meat delivery startup in the USA. Clients through our online platform choose their meat cuts assemble their customized box and in less than 48 hours this delicious argentinian steaks arrive at their home.We deliver the best meat from the best Farms in Argentina to our customers table. Essential Functions:Plan and execute all digital marketing strategies and initiatives to increase brand visibilitySEO/SEM management including keyword development AD creativity and strategy and trafficking recommendationsMaintain and engage company social media accounts such as Facebook & youtube pinterest instagramDevelop and execute email marketing campaigns for internal and external audiencesIntegrate marketing efforts (drip campaigns etc.) with sales activity and CRM systemManage company websites to align with marketing objectives including SEO efforts and content updatesMeasure the performance of digital marketing efforts using a variety of Web analytics tools (Google Analytics etc.)Meet regularly with team members to ensure the alignment of digital marketing and sales effortsCreating effective marketing campaigns geared towards clients and prospects working closely with the Marketing team graphics and editorial personnel.Developing a website and social media traffic plan with goals and benchmarks to meet.Optimize website and social media channels for SEO and usability.Owning and maintaining site analytics metrics and campaign reporting as well as analyzing key performance indicators and identifying trends.Generating reports as needed for Marketing Manager and Management Group to measure marketing’s performance.Determine best practices and think creatively on ways to improve our strategy.Master email marketing tools and send newsletter and transactional emails.Design and implement the CRM & Marketing Automation program executing concrete actions of 1: 1 marketing and marketing automation (Activation Cross Selling Up Selling and Loyalty among others) through channels such as email SMS push notifications Whatsapp and Facebook Custom Audiences.Being a startup this person will have to work together with the CMO of Argentina to start and implement all the strategies. Develop plans for the generation of leads and implement a schedule of actions and automation flows for users / clients already registered in order to accompany the objectives of opening accounts and encourage the purchase of meat cuts and subscriptions according to the cycle customer life (Acquisition Conversion Maturity and Decline). Lead data management projects and integrations with the CRM platform in order to accelerate the generation of dynamic content and increase the segmentation criteria that allow maximizing the results of 1: 1 marketing and marketing automation campaigns. Bachelor’s Degree is required and a major in Marketing is preferred.Must have Microsoft Excel PowerPoint and Word as well as photoshop and illustrator. Familiarity with marketing email systems Microsoft CRM Hubspot salesforce are helpful. Email marketing platforms such as Mailchimp active campaign Campaign monitor or  sendinblue Excellent communication (both written and verbal). Goal and Metrics orientJob Type: Full-time  80% Home office. 20% Office in San Isidro. Payout: In USD

the best Farms in Argentina to our customers table. Essential Functions:Plan and execute all digital marketing strategies and initiatives to increase brand visibilitySEO/SEM management including keyword development AD creativity and strategy and trafficking recommendationsMaintain and engage company social media accounts such as Facebook & youtube pinterest instagramDevelop and execute email marketing campaigns for internal and external audiencesIntegrate marketing efforts (drip campaigns etc.) with sales activity and CRM systemManage company websites to align with marketing objectives including SEO efforts and content updatesMeasure the performance of digital marketing efforts using a variety of Web analytics tools (Google Analytics etc.)Meet regularly with team members to ensure the alignment of digital marketing and sales effortsCreating effective marketing campaigns geared towards clients and prospects working closely with the Marketing team graphics and editorial personnel.Developing a website and social media traffic plan with goals and benchmarks to meet.Optimize website and social media channels for SEO and usability.Owning and maintaining site analytics metrics and campaign reporting as well as analyzing key performance indicators and identifying trends.Generating reports as needed for Marketing Manager and Management Group to measure marketing’s performance.Determine best practices and think creatively on ways to improve our strategy.Master email marketing tools and send newsletter and transactional emails.Design and implement the CRM & Marketing Automation program executing concrete actions of 1: 1 marketing and marketing automation (Activation Cross Selling Up Selling and Loyalty among others) through channels such as email SMS push notifications Whatsapp and Facebook Custom Audiences.Being a startup this person will have to work together with the CMO of Argentina to start and implement all the strategies. Develop plans for purchase of meat cuts and subscriptions according to the cycle customer life (Acquisition Conversion Maturity and Decline). Lead data management projects and integrations with the CRM platform in order to accelerate the generation of dynamic content and increase the segmentation criteria that allow maximizing the results of 1: 1 marketing and marketing automation campaigns. Bachelor’s Degree is required and a major in Marketing is preferred.Must have Microsoft Excel PowerPoint and Word as well as photoshop and illustrator. Familiarity with marketing email systems Microsoft CRM Hubspot salesforce are helpful. Email marketing platforms such as Mailchimp active campaign Campaign monitor or  sendinblue Excellent communication (both written and verbal). Sourcing StatementYou are applying to be part of the Novartis Talent Pool. We are not currently recruiting for this role but we are building a pipeline for future opportunities. That’s how many lives our products touched in 2018. And while we’re proud of that fact in this world of digital and technological transformation we must also ask ourselves this: how can we continue to improve and extend even more people’s lives?We believe the answers are found when curious courageous and collaborative people like you are brought together in an inspiring environment. Where you’re given opportunities to explore the power of digital and data. Where you’re empowered to risk failure by taking smart risks. And where you’re surrounded by people who share your determination to tackle the world’s toughest medical challenges.We are Novartis. Join us and help reimagine medicine.Minimum Requirements Must have a Marketing Administration Business Commercialization Health Science (medicine biology psychology pharmacy) Bachelor Degree or adequate equivalent; A post grade education will be a plus such as MBA; Must have at least 5 years of experience in sales or marketing services ideally in management position; Must have experience in High Specialty Therapeutic Areas or similar; Must have experience in developing implementing and managing marketing strategies for Private or Government Market; Must have experience and a deep understand of access; Must have experience in brand management position; Must have experience working or bringing support to Patient Oriented Programs; Must have experience working with vendors and creative agencies; Must have experience in events production; Must have strong skills in data analysis; Must have experience in training sales force; Must have Project Management skills to deliver on time each project; Must have experience in analysis marketing information; Preferably working before in Pharma companies; Must have experience and knowledge with the Healthcare Systems procedures and guidelines; Has excellent abilities to communicate influence persuade and negotiate with different teams and stakeholders; Has high ethic and integrity skills; Looks always for Operational Excellence; Has the ability to solve problems and complex issues; Has team player skills; Advanced English skills (written reading and speaking).The Novartis Group of Companies seek equal opportunities and we are proud of the diversity of our teams. Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset a theme of inspiring excellence and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.The mission of the One Commercial Partner (OCP) organization is to accelerate Microsoft’s growth through its extensive and vibrant ecosystem of managed and unmanaged partners while also guiding the definition of and establishing excellence in execution across the global OCP teams. To do this OCP focuses its efforts around four core motions: Build-with Technical Go To Market (GTM) and Partner Co-sell.The Partner Channel Marketing Manager for Partner Enablement (PCMM-E) for the LATAM Region is key to Microsoft's partner strategy as part of the One Commercial Partner (OCP) organization. This role is responsible for or building partner capacity and capabilities leveraging appropriate digital engines virtual learning and in-person events for targeted partners in support of driving partner solutions in the LATAM market.Come be part of a team that believes in the power of partnership. Partners make more possible and Microsoft has the products and programs to meet partner’s needs. We combine the widest range of products in the industry across a variety of devices and platforms with the flexibility to choose the programs and benefits necessary for your partners to build go-to-market and sell with us. As a Microsoft PCMM-E you will be enabling partners to deliver solutions into an ecosystem that connects them to the largest customer base in the world.ResponsibilitiesKey responsibilities include:Lead Partner Skills StrategyEnsure that the Partner enablement plan for LATAM Region are aligned to business priorities with approved budgets and plans across stakeholders as well as aligned to local capacity gaps working with the PMA-S.Ensure that the LATAM regional Partner enablement strategy is aligned to enablement opportunities and initiatives such as: major learning events and both WW and local skilling and talent programs. Be recognized as the Partner Skills Leader for the LATAM Region in aligning Partner enablement strategies across business priorities and sales plays.Land ESIBe the OCP Lead in the LATAM Region for ESI for Partner Program and ensure execution of 100% of identified Partners.Lead the process with the PTS roles to complete ESI skill plans for all selected Partners.Enable Partners to have latest skillsets on Advanced Workloads.Grow Partner CapacityEnsure that the number of certifications/exams and number of trained individuals is sufficient to support Microsoft area capacity/capability needs.Ensure strong number and/or percentage of Partners are leveraging local digital enablement assets.Ensure PTI assessment is completed for all managed Partners.Optimize Digital EngagementDrive business value and solution-driven Partner conversations by achieving a minimum 200-level proficiency in your respective Solution Area and a minimum 100-level proficiency in the three other Solution Areas by leveraging Microsoft Technical Skills Initiative (TSI) MyLearning MyRole and other learning resources.Complete Modern Marketer course to develop expertise in Customer Insights and Business & Marketing Strategy.Master leverage and provide ongoing feedback on Co-Sell programs and resources and extend the learning culture approach to your partners where applicable.QualificationsExperiences Required: Education Key Experiences Skills and Knowledge.5+ years of experience in digital marketing strategy and execution with proven results Experience with technology platforms and solutions with a reasonable level of technical proficiency Extensive experience of managing virtual teams across functions and geographies: Inclusive and collaborative - driving teamwork and cross-team alignment Strong partner relationship management and solution development skills Up-to-date on the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement Offers deep partner ecosystem and market insights including the competitor landscape and knowledge of partner business models Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking to connect digital and in-person marketing tactics using data Understands how to scale marketing efforts across a portfolio of breadth partners by promoting self-serve tools and tracking consumption of the tools Ability to succeed in a quickly changing business environment showing thought-leadership in driving market transformation Obsessed and committed to optimal partner and customer satisfaction Strong executive presence including communication and presentation skills with a high degree of comfort to large and small audiences Problem solving mentality leveraging internal and/or external resources conflict resolution and follow through with partners Bachelor’s degree required (Sales Marketing Business Operations); MBA desiredFully bilingual (English/Spanish) Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental disability political affiliation protected veteran status race religion sex (including pregnancy) sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws regulations and ordinances.Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.Mostrar másMostrar menos

En COR nos encontramos en la búsqueda de un Customer Success Manager para trabajar con nuestras cuentas de USA y LATAM. ¿Cuál será tu función cómo CSM?  Para este rol será importante trabajar cerca de los clientes para asegurar que estén satisfechos con el servicio que ellos reciben y mejorar las áreas que se encuentren insatisfechas. Vas a encargarte de llevar adelante el desarrollo de la relación con nuestros clientes de Estados Unidos y LATAM que promuevan la lealtad y retención. Entre tus responsabilidades están:Consultoría proactiva hacia el cliente. Ayudarlo principalmente a incrementar sus márgenes de ganancias y la colaboración del equipo en la entrega de sus proyectos. Escuchar las necesidades del cliente proponer acciones dentro de COR y evaluar sus resultados. Asegurar un uso óptimo de la plataforma por parte de todos los usuarios. Identificar oportunidades de venta: sea upselling (más usuarios o upgrade de plan) o cross-selling (otras features). Atención al cliente virtual. Evacuar dudas ayudar en conflictos y mejorar su experiencia con la herramienta. Repasar el progreso de la herramienta probar nuevos features y mostrar los principales indicadores que arroja el producto. Crear políticas y procedimientos que mejoren y optimicen las experiencias de los clientes. Recopilar comentarios de sus clientes estudiar otros programas de éxito de clientes y analizar los datos de los mismos para identificar las mejores prácticas. Proporcionar soporte técnico y de producto. Acompañar y suplir las necesidades del equipo.  Es necesario contar con:Nivel de Inglés bilingüe. Experiencia comprobable en agencias de publicidad como Ejecutivo de Cuentas o puestos similares (min 2 años). Organización y gran nivel de comunicación oral y escrita. Portugués será un plus. Conocimiento de Hubspot o SalesForce como CRM será un plus. Manejo medio/avanzado de Excel. Conocer la industria del Marketing y Publicidad. Provenir de compañías tipo SaaS será un plus.   Contamos con interesantes beneficios como work & travel (trabajar un mes desde cualquier lugar del mundo) 3 días de home office semanales OSDE Asados Afters Inglés Capacitaciones y mucho más!Mostrar másMostrar menos

Dan el máximo porque les gusta trabajar con compromiso y dedicación. Viven los cambios como oportunidades y aprenden de sus errores. Principales responsabilidades Seguimiento de las tareas que conforman al área de marketingCoordinación de tareas relacionadas con la contratación de proveedoresPreparación de reportes de seguimiento de mercadoBuenas relaciones interpersonales es indispensable poder trabajar en equipo con áreas como comercial regulatorio finanzas medical.Tener entendimiento de las particularidades del negocio en los distintos países (mercado condición de venta de los productos regulatorio etc.)Liderar el uso de los sistemas 4M SAP Ebuy Vista para la categoría NH.Realizar el seguimiento y asegurar su correcta ejecución de los procedimientos cargados en los sistemas anteriormente mencionados.Conocer los puntos de venta y trabajar en sinergia junto con el equipo de ejecución (APFs y merchandisers) y KAMs y Trade Marketing.Coordinar y realizar todas las tareas administrativas que sean necesarias para poder asegurar la correcta ejecución en tiempo y forma de los Brand plan de las marcas. Qué valoramos para esta posición  Educación: Estudiante de las carreras de Comunicación Administración de Empresas Marketing o afines con por lo menos el 50% de la carrera aprobada Conocimiento y experiencia en MS ExcelIdioma: inglés Competencias del perfil Capacidad analítica organización gestión de información y atención al cliente interno orientación a resultados y resolución de problemas y habilidades de cooperación transversal. Nuestra Propuesta Entre nosotros representamos a más de 145 nacionalidades diferentes por lo que te unirás a un equipo diverso que realmente cree en nuestra misión de ayudar a las personas de todo el mundo a vivir vidas más saludables. Como organización nos movemos y crecemos constantemente y nos aseguramos de que nuestra gente crezca con nosotros. Tendrás la posibilidad de crear tus propias oportunidades y la libertad de hacerlas realidad incluso de trabajar en diferentes partes del mundo y experimentar nuevas culturas. Nuestro entorno de trabajo flexible nos ayudó a construir un lugar de trabajo dinámico e inclusivo que funciona con confianza y respeto y que te permite vivir la vida que deseas.En Sanofi la diversidad y la inclusión son fundamentales para la forma en que operamos y están integrados en nuestros valores fundamentales. Reconocemos que para aprovechar verdaderamente la riqueza que aporta la diversidad debemos liderar con inclusión y tener un lugar de trabajo donde esas diferencias puedan prosperar y aprovecharse para potenciar la vida de nuestros colegas pacientes y clientes. Respetamos y celebramos la diversidad de nuestra gente sus antecedentes y experiencias y brindamos igualdad de oportunidades para todos.At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values. We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues patients and customers. We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people their backgrounds and experiences and provide equal opportunity for all.Mostrar másMostrar menos

DescriptionOur Client is a public company headquartered California with over 1300 employees in locations all around the world. Global teams are committed to providing next-gen video delivery and cable access solutions; is focused on providing VaaS Video Appliances and Cable Access services with high profile Internet Carriers worldwide.RequirementsWe are looking for a  Service Delivery Manager to join our company!The SDM primary role is to be a technical point of contact for Client solutions – advising and following up on customers technical needs. Work closely with account executives and product marketing to position and sell Client solutions through every aspect of the sales cycle – presentations hands-on demonstrations RFI/RFP responses design and architecture bill of material and pricing with current and prospective customers and generate winning solutions and systems designs.Moving in a very dynamic media market from a business as well as technology perspective the pre-sales role requires curiosity agility and cloud-savvy culture within LATAM region.PreferencesJIRA Protocol Stack Zabbix GrafanaResponsibilities Some of your everyday tasks will be: Understand customer’s requirements and describe how the Client solution will fit to the customer’s strategic advantage.  Work as a trusted advisor partnering with the customer on Technical Strategy and requirements.  Play a key role in interfacing with regional needs and requirements and helping to position the portfolio appropriately to win new opportunities.  Able to effectively demonstrate solutions at customer sites and be capable of running detailed technical workshops to deliver information concisely and effectively.  Strong focus on generating high customer satisfaction.  Effectively communicate product requirements from the field back into engineering and product marketing.  Exceptional time management and organization and ability to manage a predefined project or process requiring the participation and assistance of individuals from multiple functional areas. To be part of our team we expect you to have: Individual Leadership with accountability commitment to goals and ability to mobilize for success; Customer Advocacy with the ability to listen to the customer to gain insight and then orchestrate solutions; Team Representation with the ability to lead collaborate and then accelerate the team to success.  Demonstrable experienced in working with highly technical solutions and understanding customer requirements and communicating requirements and regional trends to product managers.  Understanding of enterprise internet and web technologies (Wide Area Networking Web servers Databases HTML Software Deployment best practices etc.).  Experience on managing projects with internal and external stakeholders.  Knowledge of linear and non-linear (i.e. file-based) workflows live and offline transcoding editing graphics Asset and Content Management Systems.  Good presentation verbal and written communication skills required.  Must be able to work under pressure and independently and be able to meet project deadlines for delivering quality solutions on time.  Demonstrated ability to rapidly learn new tools and technologies.  Corporate experience working on networking and infrastructure at a low-level.  Strong english skills.We Offer Exciting Projects: Come take your place at the forefront of digital transformation! With clients across all industries and sectors we offer an opportunity to work on market-defining products using the latest technologies. Collaborative Environment: Expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open laidback environment — or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities! Work-Life Balance: GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance which is why we offer flexible work schedules opportunities to work from home and paid time off on your birthday. Professional Development: Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes English classes professional certifications and technical and soft skill trainings. We also offer the chance to travel internationally Excellent Benefits: We provide our employees with competitive salaries family medical insurance extended paternity leave annual performance bonuses and referral bonuses. Fun Perks: We want you to love where you work which is why we cater breakfast daily and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants!Mostrar másMostrar menos

About The TeamThe Latin America Sales team is an exciting area of growth and investment for Qualtrics. There is a huge opportunity to make a big impact as we partner with SAP to build an incredible customer base in Latin America. Our Enterprise Sales team owns revenue growth into Qualtrics' largest strategic accounts by growing current accounts and acquiring net new customers. We work together as a team to accomplish and exceed quarterly and annual objectives. We are a visionary team that works hard and enjoys the incredible trajectory that Qualtrics provides. Our overarching objective is to drive company revenue growth through client success.Primary ResponsibilitiesThe Enterprise Account Executive is expected to lead all sales efforts within his/her assigned territory including prospect identification lead generation sales calls handling the sales cycle proposal and contract negotiation through deal closure. The Enterprise Account Executive is expected to meet sales goals established by their Sales Director while delivering the highest standard of integrity quality and customer service to our clients. Our customer's success is our success. Acquiring clients negotiating and selling the Qualtrics Experience Management platform to large strategic accounts in Latin America. Generate new leads through networking and prospecting including cold calling as well as using marketing and PR activities of the company. You will establish handle and maintain relationships between Qualtrics and senior executives of the client and prospect companies. Make sales presentations to customer and prospects at all levels and in a variety of departments (such as HR Marketing and Customer Experience) in large accounts within a prescribed territory. Address product uses benefits competitive advantages and business terms facilitate technical follow-up to close sale. In collaboration with Qualtrics' marketing team develop and execute demand generation campaigns; partner with Marketing on leads from trade shows and campaigns. Maintain a real-time understanding of the competitive landscape to assist in figuring out win-based proposals and pricing. Meet or exceed quota expectations. Qualifications At least 10 years of recent experience selling complex SaaS application software solutions to a major vertical market in Latin America. Strong track record of exceeding quota.  Experience selling SaaS solutions to market research marketing and human resource departments within strategic accounts. Experience using Salesforce.com and Mac proficiency a plus. Hold a current Drivers License. Ability to travel. BA/BS in Computer Science Business Administration of Marketing. Legally authorized to work in Chile. Qualtrics is an equal opportunity employerQualtrics provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race color religion gender national origin sexual orientation gender identity or expression age disability genetic information marital status or veteran status.Mostrar másMostrar menos

Dan el máximo porque les gusta trabajar con compromiso y dedicación. Viven los cambios como oportunidades y aprenden de sus errores. La excelencia y la ejecución son claves en su forma de hacer las cosas. Promueven el buen clima aportan alegría y diversión. Saben cómo construir con otras personas y disfrutan trabajando en equipo.Imaginate emprendiendo proyectos desafiantes dinámicos e innovadores y siendo responsable de: Evaluar oportunidades de negocios dentro de e-commerce ya sea que provengan de nuevos verticales segmentos de clientes o servicios. Analizar el negocio desde una visión 360 desde el potencial de mercado hacia las necesidades de producto a desarrollar. Definir las estrategias de entrada junto a stakeholders claves de la organización y generar el buy-in de priorización sobre las oportunidades relevantes. Desarrollar el negocio punta a punta abarcando tanto la ejecución de los primeros pasos como el project management de las diferentes iniciativas en conjunto con otros equipos como Producto Marketing Comercial Finanzas o IT.Requisitos Contar con 4 años de experiencia desarrollada en posiciones que requieran visión de negocio y estratégica y una fuerte capacidad analítica. Poseer un manejo avanzado de modelos en Excel y de armado de presentaciones para c-level. Contar con un sólido manejo de herramientas de extracción y manejo de datos como Tableau y SQL.Te Proponemos Ser parte de una compañía con espíritu emprendedor en la que nos encanta pensar en grande y a largo plazo. Ser protagonista de tu desarrollo en un ambiente de oportunidades aprendizaje crecimiento expansión y proyectos desafiantes. Compartir y aprender en equipo junto a grandes profesionales y especialistas. Un excelente clima de trabajo con todo lo necesario para que vivas una gran experiencia. :)En Mercado Libre trabajamos para promover una cultura inclusiva que busca la equidad y valora las diferentes perspectivas. Esto se traduce en género religión personas con discapacidad LGBTQ+ raza etnia y diversidad de experiencias. Trabajamos todas nuestras búsquedas con base en esta premisa. ¡Súmate a nuestro equipo!Argentina Buenos Aires CABA Capital FederalMostrar másMostrar menos

About Aggreko PlcAround the world people businesses and countries are striving for a better future. A future that needs power and the right conditions to succeed.That’s why at Aggreko we work ‘round the clock making sure our customers get the electricity heating and cooling they need whenever they need it – all powered by our trademark passion unrivalled international experience and local knowledge. From urban development to unique commercial projects and even humanitarian emergencies we bring our expertise and equipment to any location from the world’s busiest cities to some of the most remote places on earth.Every project is different so we listen first and design a system supported by our service anywhere to any scale. Transforming the lives and livelihoods of individuals organisations and communities across the globe.Purpose Of The JobTo develop and continuously improve the Commercial & Finance function within LAM through the management and coordination of all pricing models for tenders issued in the market and measurement against project execution. A key aspect of this role is to work closely with the Head of Commercial and the regional Commercial Managers BDMs PDR Engineering Operations Tax and other key functions supporting cost inputs improve the response time for proposals accuracy of cost models competitiveness and tracking / management of actual project costs vs. budget.Job Accountabilities/Key ResponsibilitiesLead all Project Cost modelling and coordinate kick-off meetings with key stakeholders and drive P&L development engineering support and prepare documents for final review with Sales and Management Liase with BDMs on a regular basis providing support on planning and development of Cost Models Support the tracking of project costs “as bid” vs. actuals through engagement with Project Management team and Finance Evaluate new enquiries for accuracy prior to P&L development and registration of enquiry numbers Develop and maintain a database of project costs to support functional review of project cost estimates Work with regional stakeholders on the continuous improvement of the Cost Model Regularley update project costs from Central and Manufacturing for new products and other variable cost components that are externally sourced Maintain country level P&L Cost Models and review quarterly with key stakeholders in ordert to accurately reflect the local taxes and other local costs Develop / maintain a central depository for all Cost Models issued across LAM power projects Review P&Ls with Head of Commercial / Project Controls to verify accuracy of costs and scope of supply Lead the development / continuous improvement of Firm and Budgetary Cost Models Continually review and present KPIs related to pricing presented enquiries raised and project returns Support Project Controls with development of localized cost models and P&Ls Liase with BDMs Engineering OPS and Product Sales Technical Support to in Cost Model and P&L development Review and update on a quarterly basis the Budgetary Proposal Pricing matrix and distribute to Head of Commercial Support Aggreko Value Proposition framework related to Sales Process improvements Develop a very strong understanding of the technical and economic features of products and product upgrades relevant to the LAM business. Support Commercial and Sales with change order pricing and disputes to reduce risks of unrecovered costs Aggreko places a strong emphasis on Quality Health Safety and Environmental protection. It is a requirement and moral obligation of each employee to be actively committed and accountable for compliance to the Aggreko Health Safety & Environmental policies procedures and local legislation and ensure completion and validity of all minimum QHSE training and objectives required by the company.Person Specification/Job RequirementsEngineering or Finance degree qualification preferred Fluent Spanish and English general understanding of Portuguese desirable Minimum 5-10 years’ experience in Latin America and/or Power Generation industry Experience in Cost Modelling and P&L development Strong financial acumen and understanding of Project Finance and Accounting Technical ability - Good understanding of technical features of Aggreko products for power projects. Quantitative skills - Highly numerate able to calculate main parameters (e.g. fuel efficiency) of Aggreko products against competitive offerings. Technology-savvy - Generally well informed both in terms of the next generation of developments for Aggreko products as well as how other competitive products (e.g. turbines) might evolve. Market & competitive orientation – complements technical skill with commercial awareness and understands market/competitive dynamics. Messaging to salesforce – is an excellent communicator – verbal and written – as this is critical to defining and delivering messages to salesforce. Prior experience - previous experience in project sales and/or marketing roles supporting project sales is an advantage. Experience with Sales Force CRM platformDesired SkillsExcellent communicator Numerate data-driven  Strong coaching and development skills  Strong leadership skills ability to develop and motivate teams in an international environment.  Good listener who seeks broad input and remains well-informed.  Inquisitive always looking for improvement opportunities and challenging constructively.  Adheres to the highest personal professional ethical and safety standards.  Self-starter who operates autonomously but highly collaboratively.  Energetic resilient and personally committed to achieving success.Desired Behaviors Team player and personally enthusiastic  Action-focused – reliable committed to completing tasks.  Resilience – persistent positive and self reliant.  Accountability – drives outcomes by taking personal responsibility. Able to give clear and unambiguous direction to individuals and teams about what they need to do in order to meet the organizations objectives.  Customer Insight – the ability to understand the markets that customers operate in to use this to identify underlying needs and then to apply this in a way that gives Aggreko a competitive advantage.  Working together with others – relates to people engages and builds relationships  Ability to view situations and conduct themselves in an objective and impartial manner  Positive Change orientation and motivator  Must be culturally sensitive  Drive for results – a deep seated inner desire to compete against standards of excellence and achieve “step changes” in business results.  Building capability - developing individuals and groups in order to increase the capability of the whole organization.  Compelling Communication – recognizing that clear communication is the key to understanding.Key Role Interactions Commercial Team  Area Sales Teams – BDMs  Area Engineering Teams  Regional Finance and Central Finance teams  Regional Operations Teams  Regional & Central PM Teams  Regional & Central Product Technical Sales SupportMostrar másMostrar menos

Small Business Development CenterPart-Time Counselor PositionThe Blue Ridge Crossroads Small Business Development Center is seeking a part-time business advisor to work with businesses who have been affected by the COVID-19 pandemic. This position is grant funded and will last through September 30th 2021 unless otherwise extended by the SBA.This position will provide guidance and support to businesses as they reopen or recover from the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic. Support services include business assessments of companies evaluation of marketing strategies assistance in developing or upgrading online marketing and business cash flow analysis. This position will provide available options to clients relative to resources in Southwest Virginia and throughout the Commonwealth. This position will be responsible for maintaining statistical data relative to client assistance and impact through the Virginia SBDC database and will be responsible for regular follow-up with clients to assure successful execution of presented strategies.Responsibilities Of This Position Include The Following Must have strong technology skills Pay attention to detail Excellent communication skills (oral and written) and excellent interpersonal skills Willing to speak publicly and work one-on-one with clients Must be self-directed yet willing to work as a team to achieve grant goals Bachelor’s degree preferred in areas of business marketing or related field May be required to telework Some travel will be requiredCover letter resume and application required. Please click on the link to apply.https://bit.ly/applysbdcSBDC is an equal opportunity employer.YourJobMatchNC.com. Category:  Keywords: Business ConsultantMostrar másMostrar menos

NOMBRE: Analista Senior Comercial Polos QR AMBA - Mercado Pago
DESCRIPCION: En Mercado Libre estamos democratizando el comercio el dinero y los pagos en América Latina.Mercado Pago es una plataforma abierta de pagos que permite cobrar las ventas realizadas on-line dentro de Mercado Libre y por fuera del sitio posibilitando a millones de comerciantes procesar de manera segura sus ventas con tarjetas de débito y crédito. Nuestras soluciones de Mercado Pago facilitan el checkout y procesamiento de pago en sitios web con la más alta tasa de confianza y aceptando más de 50 medios de pago en toda América Latina. Nuestra app de Mercado Pago y nuestras soluciones de cobros a través de dispositivos mPoint conectados a smartphones permiten disponer de puntos de venta móviles donde quiera que nuestros vendedores estén. ¿Estás preparado para innovar en un mercado de pagos digitales que recién comienza?Tenemos Un Desafío Para QuienesVibran energía emprendedora: se mueven por la curiosidad nunca se rinden y se enfocan en superar sus propios límites.Dan el máximo porque les gusta trabajar con compromiso y dedicación.Viven los cambios como oportunidades y aprenden de sus errores.La excelencia y la ejecución son claves en su forma de hacer las cosas.Promueven el buen clima aportan alegría y diversión.Saben cómo construir con otras personas y disfrutan trabajando en equipoImaginate emprendiendo proyectos desafiantes dinámicos e innovadores y siendo responsable de:Alcanzar los objetivos de adquisición y activación de vendedores y de pagadores de QR asegurando la excelencia en la ejecución y performance.Trabajar de manera directa con las agencias que gestionan los promotores de calle dando soporte y consultoría y propiciando un feedback valioso.Detectar zonas con alto potencial comercial y segmentos a desarrollar.Generar reportes de gestión y seguimiento de las zonas asignadas con el fin de identificar desvíos y oportunidades y evaluar la performance de sus agencias a cargo.Establecer sinergias con los equipos Corporativos Marketing UX Producto y Trade Marketing a fin de maximizar la fidelización de los vendedores.RequisitosSer Ing. Industrial Lic. en Administración de Empresas Economía Comercialización o carreras afines.Tener 3 años de experiencia laboral desarrollada en posiciones similares.Contar con conocimientos avanzados de Excel.Poseer conocimientos de SQL Tableau o Teradata es deseable.Te ProponemosSer parte de una compañía con espíritu emprendedor en la que nos encanta pensar en grande y a largo plazo.Ser protagonista de tu carrera en un ambiente de proyectos desafiantes oportunidades aprendizaje crecimiento y expansión.Compartir y aprender de los profesionales y especialistas más emprendedores de América Latina.Un excelente clima de trabajo con todo lo necesario para que vivas una gran experiencia. :).En Mercado Libre trabajamos para promover una cultura inclusiva que busca la equidad y valora las diferentes perspectivas. Esto se traduce en género religión personas con discapacidad LGBTQ+ raza etnia y diversidad de experiencias. Trabajamos todas nuestras búsquedas con base en esta premisa. ¡Súmate a nuestro equipo!Argentina Buenos Aires CABA Capital FederalMostrar másMostrar menos

SummaryThe Retail Operations Manager is primarily responsible for leading and developing an assigned Retail Selling and Merchandising organization. The ROM will oversee specific segment of clients and/or retailers within an assigned geography. They are responsible for representing the Company and their designated Clients & Customers through the management of retail store coverage set/project coverage executing objectives set forth by Clients Retailers and/or Business Development Managers and related retail leadership.Essential Job Duties And ResponsibilitieOperational Excellence Operational Efficiency: Maintain excellent high-performing teams and proactively ensure client KPI’s are executed consistently by addressing retail issues on an on-going basis. Oversee effective and efficient retail routing and approve all related routing decisions for an assigned region.   Associate Performance Management: Develop people through training and direct organizational and team development initiatives using performance management tools including: performance reviews in-store assessments individual associate development plans & succession planning documentation. Source and identify external talent and integrate new associates into the organization as part of a long term talent expansion strategy.  Communication/Change Management: Maintain proactive and professional communications across multiple internal and external stakeholders; lead change across responsible retail organization to ensure client and company KPIs are met.   Retail Reporting: Maintain working knowledge of company systems including all reporting functions. Interpret retail reporting data and offer actionable insights to course correct and achieve client/retailer performance expectations.  Budgeting: manage assist and/or develop expense and/orrevenue/operating income budget for area of responsibility based on responsible channel of trade and client(s) responsibility.Strategic Leadership Standardization and Execution of the Company’s Strategic Direction: Outline and implement National policies and programs. Proactively promote the Company’s Strategic Direction and Vision on a day-to-day basis and assure compliance with all National Programs.  Business Development: Grow base business and add new business.  Organizational Development: Oversee Retail Operations-wide efforts to increase effectiveness and/or efficiency enabling the organization to achieve its strategic goals.   Customer/Company Customer Team/Company Market Integration: Serve as strategic retail contact for Customers Company Business Managers RTLs/ATLs and Company Department Managers & Sales Directors in each assigned region that affect the Account Team(s). Utilize all elements and resources to meet and exceed team and Client’s requirements.Client/Retailer Partnership Management Serve as strategic retail contact for all clients in assigned region. Work to build and maintain Client/Retailer partnerships while managing ongoing client goals and KPI objectives. Pursue new Client representation and seek additional business opportunities from existing client base in an effort to add incremental value to our client base.Supervisory ResponsibilitiesDirect ReportsHires retains trains coaches guides directs and develops direct reports using company-wide processes tools and resourcesIndirect ReportsMay delegate work of others and provide guidance direction and mentoring to indirect reportsTravel And/or Driving RequirementsTravel and Driving are essential duties and function of this jobTravel up to Up to 80 %Minimum QualificationsEducation Level:  (Required) High School Diploma or GED  o r equivalent experience(Preferred) Bachelor's DegreeField of Study/Area of Experience: Marketing or Business Management5+ years of retail experience with associate managementSkills Knowledge And Abilities Customer and client management  Microsoft Office Suite proficiency  Analytical skills   Excellent written communication and verbal communication skills  Excellent customer service orientation  Strong prioritization skills  Skill in supervising to include delegating responsibility training and evaluating performance  Ability to work effectively with management  Ability to visualize and plan objectives and goals strategically  Ability to work independently and prioritize duties with minimal supervision in order to meet deadlines  Well-organized detail-oriented and able to handle a fast-paced work environment  Basic computer skills including familiarity with Word Excel and Internet usage  Ability to ensure a high level of service and quality is maintained  Ability to direct lead coach and develop people Field / Administrative Requirements Environmental & Physical RequirementsIncumbent must be able to perform the essential functions of the job. Work may be performed in an office field retail store or warehouse environment. Typically requires the ability to spend 66%+ hours each work day doing the following activities: engage in considerable physical activity ability to lift and/or push up to 50 pounds stand on feet for long periods of time use products or cook food as appropriate for the demonstration and may be required to work in extremely cold conditions (i.e. refrigerated and freezer sections). Also required to travel and drive. The use of proper safety practices when handling the products and/or cooking is essential. Additional Information Regarding The Company Job Duties and Job Descriptions Job duties include additional responsibilities as assigned by one’s supervisor or other manager related to the position/department. This job description is meant to describe the general nature and level of work being performed; it is not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities duties and skills required for the position. The Company reserves the right at any time with or without notice to alter or change job responsibilities reassign or transfer job position or assign additional job responsibilities subject to applicable law. The company shall provide reasonable accommodations of known disabilities to enable a qualified applicant or employee to apply for employment perform the essential functions of the job or enjoy the benefits and privileges of employment as required by the law.Mostrar másMostrar menos

As an Estimator you are a key team member in upholding our commitment to customer satisfaction and professionalism. You are responsible for preparing estimates within the scope of work while growing new relationships and cultivating existing relationships. Exemplifying our code of values you show respect and courtesy to all customers and employees.This position is right for you if you are self-motivated thrive in fast moving environments and are able to manage time to effectively meet deadlines. You have proven communication skills with supervisors employees and customers and are able to effectively manage a variety of situations on a day-to-day basis.Specific Responsibilities Receive incoming calls in professional and courteous manner  Schedule estimates & cleans  Perform marketing functions to sell additional work and earn business  Return customer calls respond to customer complaints and resolve breakage issues  Perform administrative functions including data entry payment processing and supply inventory  Assist with personnel management including hiring and recruiting functions  Perform other duties as needed which may include cross-training in related positions  Meet or exceed quarterly and annual goals  Meet with customers to estimate cost of jobs and services  Follow up with prospective customers by phone or email  Prepare accurate reports in regards to mileage customer estimate sheets and customer follow-up  Inventory and order estimating supplies  Seek to continuously develop as a sales professionalJob Requirements Bilingual English and Spanish Skills  Minimum two years admin experience  Strong written and verbal communication skills   Detail-oriented with strong data entry skills  Positive Attitude  Team player who can work independently  Professional appearance and personality Benefits: Benefits package varied by location We are actively interviewing for this position -Mostrar másMostrar menos

NOMBRE: Ejecutivo Comercial | para consumo masivo para San Miguel de Tucumán y la región NOA del país.
DESCRIPCION: RequisitosLa búsqueda se orienta a una persona que resida en San Miguel de Tucumán con estudios terciarios / universitarios en el área de comercialización administración o marketing (no excluyente) y con al menos 5 años de experiencia en la industria alimenticia (excluyente) y el canal distribución cubriendo la zona NOA del País.No se tendrán en cuenta aquellos/as postulantes con experiencia en la comercialización de servicios.Se busca sumar al equipo a una persona con fuerte perfil comercial y capacidad de negociación. Proactivo responsable dinámico extrovertido y con capacidad de organización y planificación.La persona a incorporar deberá contar con experiencia previa en puestos similares tener movilidad propia en buen estado (excluyente) tener disponibilidad para viajar y contar con disponibilidad full time.Actividades a RealizarTendrá a su cargo la atención directa a clientes y distribuidores estratégicos. detectar las necesidades del cliente y oportunidades de negocio comercializar la cartera de productos alimenticios de la empresa monitoreo de la acción de la competencia controlar el desarrollo de la operación logística y seguimiento de la misma administrar las cuentas corrientes y proponer acciones en los puntos de venta en forma conjunta con Tarde Marketing.OfrecemosSe ofrecen excelentes condiciones de contratación y remuneración acorde a las responsabilidades en una empresa líder del mercado alimenticio.Mostrar másMostrar menos

ITS Solution Engineer Job Description The Kimberly-Clark Professional (KCP) Global IT team is organized around world-class data analytics advanced data science and automation to drive Kimberly Clark’s commercial transformation. We are a global group of curious people and critical thinkers focused on solving the problems of the day and opportunities of the future through applied intelligence and data science. As part of this IT team the Solution Engineer is primarily responsible for integrating business information and technology architecture to create solutions for all capabilities within the Customer 360 team’s portfolio.This person will architect and lead delivery of analytics capabilities and features overseeing a globally dispersed team of developers. This role is a solution innovator/generator and an expert in complex analytical and digital platform environments; encompassing both business process understanding and technical expertise. The Customer 360 team is a global KCP business team with a bold vision to create a “5 star rated” end-to-end holistic customer experience along with analytical capabilities that drive powerful customer connections and business growth. The Solution Engineer has a dotted line to the Customer 360 Team Assoc.Director and will work closely to bring thought leadership into the definition and execution of the strategic roadmap. This role is frequently in communication with the Customer 360 Team Product Owner(s) building relationships discussing progress new capabilities and strategies. Scope/Categories: * Key Interfaces: Functional Engineers Business Customers Data & Analytics teams Solution Engineers Enterprise Architects Analytics Designers Project Manager Data Visualization. * External Interfaces: Consultants Vendors Managed Services Providers (onshore/offshore). * Travel may include approximately 15% of work time. * Role will not have any direct reports. * Required fluent English and Spanish written and spoken skills Key Accountabilities: * Leads in designing innovative technical solutions to important highly complex strategic and operating problems.Has strong knowledge in business and technical functions that are touch points with their area of expertise.Provides technical consulting on complex projects. * Acts as a source of direction training and guidance for other team members. * Is knowledgeable in industry best practices in their area of expertise and uses resources outside of K-C to deliver the end-to-end technical solutions. * Technical architect of large and extra-large projects for Digital Sales. * Accountable for leading the overall end-to-end technical design (including detailed configuration) which incorporates business requirements and considers global standards and regional variations. * Delivers solution delivery blueprints including but not limited to application diagrams physical architecture process diagrams sequence diagrams systems maps service interfaces technical interfaces data modeling integration planning and detailed build estimates. * Translates non-functional and functional requirements into end-to-end analytical solution designs ensuring solution aligns with business goals and processes uses and provides enterprise information consistently integrates effectively with other applications and supports a common application environment. * Implements seamless digital analytics utilizing common technology platforms to achieve enterprise level security quality of service and scale for analytical solutions. * Collaborates directly with Customers (e.g. SMEs) other Solution Engineers Enterprise Architecture and Analytics Designers and members of the Customer 360 team to make sure that the solution fits within enterprise context. * Documents solution in appropriate service management applications. * Coordinates engagements with vendors as they relate to evaluation design and delivery of business capabilities. * Contributes to the evaluation and selection of software products. * Influences and moves the K-C culture to one that values and uses cross-business and functional data and analytics to power business performance. Key Qualifications and Experiences: * Bachelor's degree required. * 7+ years of continuous experience in software engineering software development solution architecture. * Basic functional knowledge in key CPG capabilities (Sales eCommerce Marketing Supply Chain Finance etc.). * Broad range of business and IT experiences; has achieved technical and/or business certification(s). * Strong technical knowledge of diverse analytical tools and solutions (APIs RPA SQL BW Tableau).Hands-on experience with SAP HANA Enterprise preferred. Knowledge of Microsoft Azure and related Azure components desirable. * Strong technical leadership of Analytics Delivery teams and vendors. Experience leading IT projects and/or programs with strong SDLC understanding including Agile / Waterfall methodologies. * Working knowledge of API-based design for business applications and can incorporate API-based design into analytics solutions.(Mulesoft experience desired.). * Experience with integration methods and tools including ETL and virtualization. * Experience with SAP software solutions (ECC BW BI) required. * Exposure to Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning technologies (R Python Scala etc.). * Experience leading IT projects and/or programs with strong SDLC experience including Agile / Waterfall methodologies. Exposure to Agile fundamentals and able to lead key ceremonies. Act as Scrum Master for a team following all standard work practices. * Ability to operate in a digital workplace utilizing modern technologies to connect collaborate communicate and cooperate across a global organization and across organizational boundaries. * Ability to work in a virtual team which works across distance (remote) cultures and time zones in a matrix with multiple reporting lines and may extend outside the K-C organization including suppliers partners and customers. * Ability to communicate strategies and processes around data modeling and architecture to cross functional groups and senior levels. Experience collaborating with Enterprise Architects and infrastructure engineers to identify design and implement highly complex end-to-end solutions. * Thought leader with strong connection to industry and technology user groups and networks.Keeps abreast of leading trends in digital cloud artificial intelligence machine learning block chain virtual reality augmented reality and combinations of technology that matter in IoT. * High level of communication is required. Must be self-motivated self-disciplined and have strong time management skills. Embraces learning agility to keep abreast of new technologies and strategies. * Possesses strong leadership skills and exhibits creative thinking to be able to design inventive solutions which solve business challenges. Cultivates networking opportunities within the organization. Global VISA and Relocation Specifications: Primary Location Argentina-Buenos Aires Additional Locations Worker Type Employee Worker Sub-Type Regular Time Type Full timeMostrar másMostrar menos
